dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener, Sarah from Denver, writes in asking about the best countries for digital nomads post-pandemic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener, Sarah from Denver, writes in asking about the best countries for digital nomads post-pandemic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's a great question. I was just reading about Canada taking the top spot on the Digital Nomad Index.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's a great question. I was just reading about Canada taking the top spot on the Digital Nomad Index.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Taking the top spot is Canada.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it makes sense—21.3% of its population are immigrants, and it's got one of the largest tech hubs globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it makes sense-twenty one point three percent of its population are immigrants, and it's got one of the largest tech hubs globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Home to one of the largest tech hubs in the world it scores well across the board, from fast internet speeds to a top ten ranking on the Global Happiness Index and by far the most remote job search returns in the top ten. Coupled with its renown as one of the worlds friendliest and most welcoming countries, its easy to see why 21.3% of its population is made up of immigrants and why it sits at the top of this years index.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the internet speeds there are super fast, which is obviously a huge plus if you're working remotely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the internet speeds there are super fast, which is obviously a huge plus if you're working remotely.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Home to one of the largest tech hubs in the world it scores well across the board, from fast internet speeds to a top ten ranking on the Global Happiness Index and by far the most remote job search returns in the top ten.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The UK came in second, which is kind of surprising with all the, uh, Brexit stuff going on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The U K came in second, which is kind of surprising with all the, uh, Brexit stuff going on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Somewhat surprisingly considering the current turmoil of Brexit, the UK is the runner up thanks to the volume of remote jobs available coupled with a high standard of living.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But they've got a ton of remote job opportunities and a really strong arts scene, so it balances out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But they've got a ton of remote job opportunities and a really strong arts scene, so it balances out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Somewhat surprisingly considering the current turmoil of Brexit, the UK is the runner up thanks to the volume of remote jobs available coupled with a high standard of living.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Romania in third place was a shocker for me. I mean, who thinks of Romania first?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Romania in third place was a shocker for me. I mean, who thinks of Romania first?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Third place goes to Romania a country Id wager isnt on most peoples digital nomad radar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently it's got some of the fastest-growing IT markets in Europe, and get this—broadband is like eight bucks a month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently it's got some of the fastest-growing I T markets in Europe, and get this-broadband is like eight bucks a month.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But as one of the fastest growing information technology markets in Central and Eastern Europe, its a great marriage of opportunity and fantastically low living costs super fast fixed line broadband packages cost around $8 a month!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Eight dollars? That's insane. And the index looked at things like rental prices, internet speed, even the Global Happiness Index.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eight dollars? That's insane. And the index looked at things like rental prices, internet speed, even the Global Happiness Index.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With that in mind Circle Loop has done the legwork for you, taking in a range of factors from the price and speed of net connections to rental prices and remote job searches. It even takes in country rankings on the Global Happiness Index.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Circle Loop did all the legwork, which is super helpful 'cause researching all that yourself would be a nightmare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Circle Loop did all the legwork, which is super helpful 'cause researching all that yourself would be a nightmare.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With that in mind Circle Loop has done the legwork for you, taking in a range of factors from the price and speed of net connections to rental prices and remote job searches.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with working holiday visas becoming more common, it's way easier to just pick up and go.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with working holiday visas becoming more common, it's way easier to just pick up and go.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response to the increased need to work from home many countries have introduced working holiday visas to encourage a new form of tourism to boost their badly affected coffers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. If you've been working remotely already, why not do it from a beach or a mountain retreat somewhere?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. If you've been working remotely already, why not do it from a beach or a mountain retreat somewhere?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After all, if youve worked remotely and effectively for months theres no reason you cant continue to do so from further afield, whether thats a mountain retreat, beachside resort or far flung city you love.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Though you gotta be careful, you know, only go where it's safe travel-wise with the pandemic stuff still around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Though you gotta be careful, you know, only go where it's safe travel-wise with the pandemic stuff still around.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With vaccinations starting to roll out globally and hopes of more freedom of movement coming soon, theres never been a better time to embrace life as a digital nomad to continue working remotely but combine it with travel (to the places and at the times its safe to do so), new experiences and a complete change of lifestyle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. But it's a pretty cool time to rethink how we work and live. Australia made the list too, at number nine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. But it's a pretty cool time to rethink how we work and live. Australia made the list too, at number nine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It tops a strong run of European countries dominating the index aside from Canada, the only other non European country in the top ten is Australia in ninth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the top ten is mostly European countries though—eight out of ten, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the top ten is mostly European countries though-eight out of ten, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Digital Nomad Index top ten features eight European countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how the pandemic kinda forced this shift, but maybe it's a change for the better for a lot of people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how the pandemic kinda forced this shift, but maybe it's a change for the better for a lot of people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This has only been exacerbated by the Covid-19 pandemic and stay-at-home requirements enforced by many countries around the world.
